snippet.title: Introducing Warz: The Fallen Celestial - Stormgate reveal at gamescom latam 2024
snippet.description:
Meet Warz--the fallen Celestial. 

Warz (voiced by Simu Liu), is a central figure in the Stormgate storyline and leads the Infernal invasion of Earth. He was revealed in playable form exclusively at gamescom latam during the opening countdown. 

Play as Warz for free up to level 5 in the 3P co-op mode when the game launches to Steam Early Access on August 13.  In the future, Warz will be playable in the upcoming 3v3 mode (currently in development and set to debut during Early Access). 

Want to get into the game even earlier? 
Visit the Stormgate page on Steam and pre-purchase any Early Access Pack to get in on July 30!:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2012510/Stormgate/

Want to become part owner of Frost Giant Studios? You can become an investor ahead of the upcoming Early Access release. Check out the stock offering on StartEngine:
https://www.startengine.com/offering/frostgiant

Become part of the Stormgate community on Discord: 
https://discord.gg/stormgate

Join the discussion on Reddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/Stormgate/

Follow Stormgate on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/PlayStormgate

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/FrostGiantStudio

#gamescomlatam #countdown #gcl
